questions.question: Which ports can pass messages to downstream actions?
External Actions have both input and output ports.
What is a disadvantage of triggering events within a workspace using a transformer, instead of within an Automation?
options: The workspace can trigger an event during a translation, rather than at the end of it.
You won't know whether the workspace completed successfully or not when the event is triggered.
The workspace does not need to be run on FME Server to take this action. It will produce the same result when run using FME Desktop.
The workspace will always be slower when using FME Desktop instead of FME Server.

questions.question: What Automations feature can you use to pass information between Actions?
